rules_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a land card from among them. If you do, put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you didn't reveal a land card this way, put one of those cards into your hand. Put the rest of the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: [i]“Professor... I have been thinking. About why I came to Fódlan. To the Empire. I am here to be protecting Edelgard...”[/i]
